name: Py - Dungeon Crawler
description:
Improve your player by giving damage/defense modifiers to rolls, or maybe increasing your health or being faster so you have more opportunities?

Just a quick project where you roll digital dice (all gets done for you) to make your way as deep into the dungeon as possible!

Code is a bit messy, but things to play around with are at the very top!

You can play it without downloading here:

https://trinket.io/python/3c405371b8?outputOnly=true&runOption=run

If you want to look at the code you can find a direct link to the pastebin: https://pastebin.com/JFx8E67p

I have also included a exe if thats any easier! :D
